enemies.name: archer
enemies.intro: The huntsman sits perched atop a tower.
enemies.surrender: He shows no mercy; his arrow lodges itself in your head, killing you instantly.

enemies.name: footman
enemies.intro: The soldier clutches a spear tightly in their hand.
enemies.surrender: They do not accept your surrender. They thrust their spear through your heart, killing you instantly.

enemies.name: veteran
enemies.intro: The armoured knight towers over you.
enemies.surrender: The knight scoffs; he has no time for mercy. Mace in hand, he crushes your skull, killing you instantly.

enemies.name: scoundrel
enemies.surrender: They accept your surrender, and urge you to flee. While your back is turned, though, they launch a bomb in your direction. Your death is instant.

enemies.name: engineer
enemies.intro: The methodical builder fortifies his defenses.
enemies.surrender: He accepts your surrender and lowers his weapon. A loose brick from one of his contraptions slips and falls on your head. You die instantly.

enemies.name: naked maul man
enemies.intro: At a measly 4ft tall, the short-stacked hammer wielder doesn't seem much of a threat.
enemies.surrender: Big mistake. He knows not the concept of mercy, and kills you with his hammer quite brutally. And instantly.
